text: Adrian Adgar (born 1965) is a male retired cyclist who competed for England. ==Cycling career== Adgar finished runner-up in the 1987 British National Madison Championships with Paul Wain. He represented England in the 10 miles scratch race event, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. ==References== Category:English male cyclists Category:1965 births Category:Cyclists at the 1986 Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Adrian Adgar
